akas: Asobi Asobase: Workshop of Fun World-wide (English title)
akas from release info: Asobi Asobase: Workshop of Fun World-wide (English title)

1.title: Equivalent Exchange/Cheap Thrills/Pleasure Seekers/The Kind Pervert

episode of.title: Asobi Asobase: Workshop of Fun (TV Series 2018– )

1.plot: Olivia has an odd way of playing look-the-other-way. Her opponent, Hanako, convinces Kasumi to play against her instead. This is the beginning of the Pastimers Club.

2.title: Killing Time/Friendship Game/The Witch Trials/Non-title Match

episode of.title: Asobi Asobase: Workshop of Fun (TV Series 2018– )

2.plot: The Pastimers don't have the minimum number of members necessary to be officially recognized as a club. They attempt to negotiate with the student council president, who isn't impressed by the club's activities.

3.title: A Battle That Must Be Won/Puppets/Betting My Life

episode of.title: Asobi Asobase: Workshop of Fun (TV Series 2018– )

3.plot: Kasumi isn't amused at the stakes involved in the game that Hanako and Olivia are playing. Her well-meant intention to make the game more wholesome backfires.

4.title: Lower Body Lasers/Pots and Kettles/Illegal Occupation/Butt Play

episode of.title: Asobi Asobase: Workshop of Fun (TV Series 2018– )

4.plot: Maeda, who works at Hanako's home, fires lasers from his butt. This offers Kasumi with a unique perspective for her fan fiction.

5.title: Devilish Taste/Loaded Questions/Maeda's Curse/Sex Ed

episode of.title: Asobi Asobase: Workshop of Fun (TV Series 2018– )

5.plot: Hanako arrives at a café to meet up with Olivia and Kasumi. Olivia and Kasumi were just commenting on how this is the first time they've seen each other out of their school uniforms and when they see Hanako, they are shocked. Olivia asks Hanako if she hit her head on the way there, but Hanako tells them that her clothes were a very special kind of haute couture.

6.title: Asterisk/Studying for Exams/A New Look/Spirited Combat, Again

episode of.title: Asobi Asobase: Workshop of Fun (TV Series 2018– )

6.plot: Hanako and the other girls are asked by Oka-san from the Occult Research Club if they want to read a grimoire with her. They ask Oka-san how gathering members is going for the club and she tells them that she hasn't been able to find anyone since. Apparently the reason she ended up on her own suddenly is two had graduated, one had transferred and another one teleported. After hearing that, Hanako and the others didn't know what to do.

7.title: Phantom Thieves: Pass Club/Woman of Terror/Weirdo Go/Boobie Tragedy

episode of.title: Asobi Asobase: Workshop of Fun (TV Series 2018– )

7.plot: Hanako, Olivia, and Kasumi are asked by Aozora Tsugumi to go into the student council room to retrieve the Banana Papers that are hidden somewhere in there. The Banana Papers contain scandals that have happened around school and the student council president is apparently using that to blackmail other students. Hanako and the other girls try to decline the request, but Tsugumi manages to buy them all off one way or another and they end up having to go get the Banana Papers.

8.title: Gotta "Catch" 'Em All/Divine Revelation/The Evil Sugoroku

episode of.title: Asobi Asobase: Workshop of Fun (TV Series 2018– )

8.plot: When Hanako sees Olivia wandering around the classroom with her face glued to her smartphone, she assumes she's playing that popular monster-collecting game, but it turns out that she's playing an unfamiliar game called Bactéri GO. Olivia explains that the objective of the game is to collect the many kinds of bacteria that populate the area, and that it was developed in her parents' country. She describes the game in detail to Hanako.

9.title: Troubles of a Fake Foreigner/A Dutchey Wife/Genetic Engineering

episode of.title: Asobi Asobase: Workshop of Fun (TV Series 2018– )

9.plot: Olivia's classmates try to strike a conversation with her during the break after English class. She hadn't talked to them much until then, even though their seats are nearby, but thanks to Hanako and Kasumi, who don't speak to her much in class, her classmates are still under the impression that she's fluent in English. Olivia begs Hanako to talk to her more in class so she can fix the misconception that she's good at English.

10.title: Heart Go Boing Boing/Hanako's Trial of Shame/Secret of the Dong/Film Production

episode of.title: Asobi Asobase: Workshop of Fun (TV Series 2018– )

10.plot: Because of her appearance, Fujiwara-san is assumed to be good at classical literature, even though her talent is in English, having replaced Olivia in the English speech contest and won. She's exasperated by all of her classmates who come to her to ask for help with classical literature during break time, and she comes to Olivia for someone to speak in English with. Olivia becomes fearful, suspecting that Fujiwara-san has figured out that she can't speak English.

11.title: Goodbye, Student Council President/Oka-ken Witch Project/Face of Mass Destruction

episode of.title: Asobi Asobase: Workshop of Fun (TV Series 2018– )

11.plot: The three visit the student council president to demand that their film be accepted for the cultural festival. The president, meanwhile, is busy trying to get the vice president to let her visit the boys school across the street.

12.title: Daniel/Bra Meeting/Fairy Tale Battle Royale/Paper Wars

episode of.title: Asobi Asobase: Workshop of Fun (TV Series 2018– )

12.plot: The Pastimer's Club look after Chisato's friend's baby Daniel, who they soon discover has a bad attitude for his age. Hanako looks into buying her first bra, only to discover her bust is smaller than she thought. The girls play a cutesy appearing online game, which soon turns out to be a gory battle royale game. Afterwards, the girls, along with Maeda, play a drawing battle game that makes little sense.

13.title: OVA

episode of.title: Asobi Asobase: Workshop of Fun (TV Series 2018– )

13.plot: Included with seventh volume of the Asobi Asobase manga.

imdb.plot outline: The story revolves around three classmates who play simple hand games. One of the girls is good at games, but hates them as she always lost to her older sister and forced to do chores while growing up. Another girl is of American descent, but raised in Japan, and who only pretends to be bad at Japanese. Another girl usually observes their games, and loses to the other girls.
imdb.title: Asobi Asobase: Workshop of Fun
plot: The story revolves around three classmates who play simple hand games. One of the girls is good at games, but hates them as she always lost to her older sister and forced to do chores while growing up. Another girl is of American descent, but raised in Japan, and who only pretends to be bad at Japanese. Another girl usually observes their games, and loses to the other girls.
